name: Deal 100% of all damage to enraged Queen Bee and defeat it
Obtain any type of golf trophy
Create the following biome: Evil Ocean
Submerge and stay in lava for 10 seconds
Defeat a Hardmode enemy without entering Hardmode
Kill a Maggot Zombie, Ghost, and Raven
Obtain 4 unique types of grass seeds
Fall from the surface all the way to the underworld without breaking your fall
Throw a Stink Potion on yourself
Kill a monster using a Sandgun
Have "BINGO" appear in chat using an announcement box
Drown with a breathing reed in hand
